### **Title: Simultaneous Interpretation Services**
### **Reference Number:** PW-22-01010651
### **Publication Date:** October 20, 2022
### **Tender Closing Date:** November 24, 2022, 2:00:00 PM
### **Contracting Entity:** Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
### **Amendment Number:** Amendment 004
### 
#### **Overview:**
The Government of Canada invites Requests for Proposal for simultaneous interpretation services on an as-needed basis. ESDC requires real-time virtual interpretation services for virtual training sessions and events held in the Atlantic Region.
#### **Objective:**
The objective is to provide accurate, simultaneous interpretation services in both English and French for a minimum of three (3) sessions per year.
#### **Scope:**
The contract duration is estimated to be one year plus two (2) additional one-year option periods.
#### **Conditions of Service:**
*   Services must meet the requirements of the Official Languages Act.
*   A minimum of three (3) sessions per year is guaranteed.
*   Services will be provided in English and/or French.
*   The contract duration includes an option for two (2) additional one-year periods.

#### **Trade Agreements:**
This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### **languages:**
English and French

#### **Regions of Opportunity:**
Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Prince Edward Island

#### **Regions of Delivery:**
Nova Scotia, Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick, and Prince Edward Island

#### **Point of Contact:**
-   Eric Potvin, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

#### **Documentation:**
You can download the tender documents from the following link:
